answers.answer: Hi Casey.  I'm so sorry you have all these problems at such a young age.    I'm concerned because you definitely need the care of a doctor.  If you don't have insurance, maybe try the ER.  Do you have parents that can help?  You can't go on feeling like this.Is is possible you have diabetes?  The being thirsty, hungry, frequent urination can all be symptoms of diabetes.  If you do indeed have a thyroid disorder, you need medication for this.  I have this myself.  It doesn't go away unless you get the proper medication.Please try to find someone to take you to the doctor.
